title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring: Deleting fields context menu overridden by message dialog
description: Observed behavior issue when running JUnit on Linux Motif and Windows 2000. Steps to reproduce involve setting up JUnit, enabling the option 'Code Generator: Remove prefix from field names,' and interacting with the outliner in TestCase.java.
OB: When right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner, the context menu for refactoring field deletion is overridden by a message dialog.
EB: Expected behavior is for the refactoring context menu to be displayed without interference from message dialogs when deleting fields.
SR:
1. Set up JUnit.
2. Enable the option 'Code Generator: Remove prefix from field names.'
3. Open TestCase.java.
4. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName' and observe that the refactoring context menu appears as expected without being overridden by a message dialog.
